protagonist.current_state: A young girl named Ichiko who discovers magical slippers that make her jump incredibly high

plot_summary: Ichiko finds mysterious slippers in her room
The slippers make her body feel light and allow her to jump very high
She jumps over her desk, then her house roof
The slippers make her jump higher and higher - over rivers, forests, and mountains
She almost reaches the stars but gets tired and comes back down
She returns to bed with the slippers quietly by her pillow
open_threads: Where did the magical slippers come from?
Will Ichiko use the slippers again for more adventures?
